name: Camp Focus
description:
This is your own camp, enjoy it! Features [/]

  • Beautiful lowpoly style scenes with fun active effects

  • LO-FI, chill style light music suitable for relaxing and thinking

  • White noise that can be added freely]

  • Set a focus on the business and set a time to track its completion

  • Break down the task into one subtask and cross them out when finished
